title: Does nanotechnology exist in real life? - Quora

response.answer_text: Is there such a thing as nanotech? You asked that question with a nanotech device called “a microchip.” Modern microchips use nanoscale circuits. Example: 7 nanometer processes Control of material microstructures (nanostructures?) at the nanoscale is also known in metallurgy, electronic materials, and other materials fields. Example: Superstrength of nanograined steel with nanoscale intermetallic precipitates transformed from shock-compressed martensitic steel If you mean, “Are there sci-fi nanobots and nanites?” the answer is “no, nanotech is much more boring than that.”
